message.body: The boards were more expensive than I thought but I got a board and bindings for 450
Nice! Still much cheaper than the original price I bet.
They didn't have any demo boards in your size?
Nope, and the demo stuff wasnt that much cheaper either. The combo i got would have been 750 new so im pleased
Hope you are having fun with the family on this beautiful Saturday. I just saw an email from Josh-we should probably get back to him about the w/d...
I wrote to him last night
